channel.title: Introduction on REAL Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on REAL Documentation

item.title: Design
item.description: Page loading: (1) SQL + Paging + no count required if less than one page found - lots of complex SQL’s when paging - table can be any size… +/- new records appear during browsing (2) Read Keys, load records by Id + refresh of records without adding / loosing records more stable + one complex SQL, lots of easy loads + order does not change after deleting, inserting, navigating, changing sort-order field or chaning a field that removes it by a filter +/- background incremental loading is possible - maximum number of Id’s, then a ‘more…’ indicator
